basics.name: Sebastián Aguilera Novoa
basics.label: Physicist - Programmer
basics.summary: A Colombian physicist interested in computational physics, numerical methods, and machine learning ideas applied to bioacoustics.

work.name: Escuela Tecnológica Instituto Técnico Central (ETITC)
work.summary: Teaching java programming (Backend and Frontend), databases, operating systems, and data structure to university students of systems engineering.

work.name: MarBAI
work.summary: Create, deploy, and evaluate intelligent agents using Python, the ChatGPT API, and REST APIs to generate digital content for social media.

education.area: Center for Electricity, Electronics and Telecommunications

awards.title: Awarded Jhoti and Salazar Scholarship
awards.awarder: São Carlos Institute of Physics, University of Sao Paulo (USP)

awards.title: Second best undergraduate dissertation in physics
awards.awarder: Physics Department, National University of Colombia
awards.summary: Second best undergraduate dissertation in physics

certificates.name: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization

publications.name: Design, development, and evaluation of a computational physical model to generate synthetic birdsongs from recorded samples

references.name: Professor Francisco Gómez J.
references.reference: Engineering and associate professor in the Mathematics Department at Universidad Nacional de Colombia, in Bogotá (Colombia), working in computer science and applied math. His research interests include computational sustainability, specifically brain imaging and computational ecology. He works on computational sustainability problems interacting with the private and public sectors.

references.name: Professor Gabriel Mindlin
references.reference: Physicist and associate professor at the Universidad de Buenos Aires (UBA). Gabriel is leader of the Dynamic System Laboratory (LSD) which is a pioneering laboratory in the Physics/Biology interdiscipline, furthermore, it has produced high impact publications and patents. He is mainly interested in dynamics and biophysics.

projects.name: Birdsongs
projects.summary: A python package to analyze, visualize and generate synthetic birdsongs.

projects.name: Molecular modeling and simulations
projects.summary: Study and evaluation of the unbinding kinetics of Mineralocorticoid (MR and MR-S810L) receptor steroid agonist Cortisol (COL), Aldosterone (AS4), and Progesterone (STR) ligands using Molecular Dynamics (MD) and Monte Carlo (MC) simulations, LiGaMD and LiBELa softwares respectively.

projects.name: Soundscapes analysis - maad
projects.summary: Create code, examples, and documentation of spectral and time trait functions.

projects.name: Aprender - A New Way of Learning
projects.summary: A course preparatory of physics and mathematics for the exam Saber 11 applied by ICFES. I designed, created and hosted a homepage for the preparatory. For the webpage I implemented the Moodle platform as a Learning Management Platform. Furthermore,  I teach mathematics and physics, I designed and created of lessons and tests for evaluation.

projects.name: Recorder Characterization
projects.summary: Study the recorder musical instrument from experimental, theoretical, and computational physics. Addionally, analyze and visualize the structured data generated and measured from the study in order to compare them.
